In the group Files section I uploaded the mp3 file provided by  group 
member Tama of last week's NHK Shinsengumi episode in which Hijikata 
sings while a couple of the other guys (Kondou, Inoue, Nagakura & 
Harada) do a dance. The video quality isn't 100% sharp but it's not bad 
and the sound is just fine.

And you even get to see Harada showing off his bright yellow fundoshi. 
whoa baby....

-- 
Barbara Sheridan	

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
